sent.orig: Compulsory inspection is divided into preliminary inspection, operation inspection, and temporary inspection.
sent.trans: 强制检验分为初次检验、营运检验和临时检验。

sent.orig: Egg quality inspection generally included external quality inspection and internal quality inspection.
sent.trans: 禽蛋品质检测一般分外部品质检测和内部品质检测两大部分。

sent.orig: Compile the inspection and test plan of components purchased including process inspection and final acceptance inspection.
sent.trans: 制定采购部件的检验试验计划，包括过程检验和最后验收程序的计划。

sent.orig: Implement process inspection, final inspection, outgoing inspection.
sent.trans: 过程检验，最终检验，出货检验。

sent.orig: The commodity inspection authorities may, when necessary, dispatch inspection personnel part in inspection and supervision.
sent.trans: 商检机构根据需要可以派出检验人员参加。
